author: Special Correspondent
text:
Special lectures and administering pledge marked the consumer awareness programme held at Bharathiyar Arts and Science College for women, Deviyakurichi, recently. The event was brought up by the Citizen Consumer Club (CCC) of the college.

D. Rajakumari, principal, explained the tremendous rights of consumers and how to avoid the exploitation of consumers.

At the end, the students, members of the CCC, and faculty members took a pledge to be a part in observing and developing awareness among the consumers.
title: Awareness programme
